title: Dynamic Shrinkage Priors for Large Time-varying Parameter Regressions using Scalable Markov Chain Monte Carlo Methods. (arXiv:2005.03906v2 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
abstract: Time-varying parameter (TVP) regression models can involve a huge number of coefficients. Careful prior elicitation is required to yield sensible posterior and predictive inferences. In addition, the computational demands of Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) methods mean their use is limited to the case where the number of predictors is not too large. In light of these two concerns, this paper proposes a new dynamic shrinkage prior which reflects the empirical regularity that TVPs are typically sparse (i.e. time variation may occur only episodically and only for some of the coefficients). A scalable MCMC algorithm is developed which is capable of handling very high dimensional TVP regressions or TVP Vector Autoregressions. In an exercise using artificial data we demonstrate the accuracy and computational efficiency of our methods. translated_title: 动态收缩先验在使用可扩展马尔科夫链蒙特卡罗方法进行大规模时变参数回归中的应用(arXiv:2005.03906v2 [econ.EM] UPDATED)
translated_abstract: 时变参数（TVP）回归模型可能涉及大量系数。需要仔细的先验探询，以得出合理的后验和预测推论。此外，马尔科夫链蒙特卡罗（MCMC）方法的计算需求意味着仅在预测变量数不太多的情况下使用。鉴于这两个问题，本文提出了一种新的动态收缩先验，反映了TVP通常是稀疏的经验规律（即时间变化可能仅偶尔发生，并且仅涉及某些系数）。开发了一种可扩展的MCMC算法，能够处理非常高维度的TVP回归或TVP向量自回归。在使用人造数据进行的一项练习中，我们展示了我们的方法的准确性和计算效率。在涉及欧元区利率期限结构的应用中，我们发现我们的动态收缩先验可以有效挑选出少量的时间变化系数。
tldr: 该论文提出了一种新的动态收缩先验，用于处理时变参数回归模型中的稀疏性问题，并开发了一种可扩展的MCMC算法，能够处理非常高维度的TVP回归或TVP向量自回归。该方法在处理大规模数据时表现准确，且计算效率高。
en_tdlr: The paper proposes a new dynamic shrinkage prior to handle the sparsity of time-varying parameter regression models and develops a scalable MCMC algorithm to handle high dimensional TVP regressions. The method shows high accuracy and computational efficiency in handling large data.
